name: Noah's Ark: Splash and Dash - PC Demo
name_original: Noah's Ark: Splash and Dash - PC Demo
description:
Run, Jump, Chop, Collect, Find, & Solve Puzzles in this 3D Adventure with Noah to Hurry and save the Human Race, The Animals, and The World! 

Blending elements of a 3D Platformer, Puzzles, Endless Runner Style Quests, and more, you gotta play it to see it! 

Our Promise: Kid-Safe, Family-Fun. - Contains No Ads! Thank-you for your support!

Download and try the Demo For Windows PC Here.    Full Game at the links below!
